item.title: 美团、阿里巴巴股价大涨，中国政府正寻求遏制价格战
item.description: 中国最大外卖平台股价上涨，因国家最高反垄断机构启动对该行业竞争行为的调查，市场由此期待监管部门将遏制补贴驱动的价格战。【原文：Shares of China’s biggest food-delivery firms climbed as the nation’s top antitrust body launched a probe into competition practices in the sector, spurring hopes that authorities will rein in subsidy-driven price wars.】

item.title: 花旗称印尼今年赤字可能突破3%法定上限
item.description: 花旗集团表示，随着政府加大对全国免费供餐计划的投入，以及对苏门答腊岛受洪水影响省份的重建力度，印度尼西亚今年的财政赤字很可能大幅超出法定限额。【原文：Indonesia’s fiscal deficit is likely to widen well beyond its legal limit this year as the government ramps up spending on its nationwide free meals program and the rebuilding of flood-hit provinces in Sumatra island, according to Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 瑞迪恩在中国卸载必和必拓铁矿石，交易商测试限制措施
item.description: 一艘满载必和必拓集团金伯利铁矿石的散货船在中国卸货，此前该船在近海闲置数周。尽管价格争议仍在持续，但贸易商仍坚持运送受限货物，此类情况实属罕见。【原文：A bulk carrier laden with BHP Group’s Jimblebar iron ore has discharged in China after weeks idling offshore, in a rare case of a trader pressing ahead with restricted cargoes despite an ongoing pricing dispute.】

item.title: 铁矿石价格上涨，补库需求与生铁产量提升市场情绪
item.description: 铁矿石价格上涨，得益于节前钢铁厂的补货需求以及生铁产量的提升。【原文：Iron ore advanced, buoyed by pre-holiday restocking from steel mills and a lift in hot-metal output.】

item.title: 印度新股上市激增 推高IPO费用至历史新高
item.description: 去年印度首次公开募股（IPO）承销费创下4.17亿美元的纪录，反映出股票上市数量激增，且商业文化正逐步摆脱低价驱动的模式。【原文：Investment banks earned a record $417 million underwriting fees for initial public offerings in India last year, reflecting a surge in stock listings and a gradual shift away from a business culture driven by low prices.】

item.title: 亚洲股市受美国就业报告提振走高，韩国股市创历史新高
item.description: 新兴亚洲股市周一上涨，此前美国就业数据低于预期，推动股市上周五创下新高。【原文：Emerging-Asian equities gained on Monday after a lower-than-expected US jobs print pushed stocks to fresh highs on Friday.】

item.title: 铜价逼近历史高位，因供应担忧与美元走软
item.description: 铜价逼近历史高位，基本金属本周以看涨态势开局，得益于供应担忧和美元走软的支撑。【原文：Copper rose toward a record, as base metals opened the week in bullish form aided by concerns over supplies and a weaker dollar.】

item.title: 中国重启大豆拍卖，同时继续从美国采购
item.description: 中国重启大豆拍卖——此前曾暂停三周——此举显然旨在清理仓储空间，因中美达成贸易休战后，中国持续从美国采购大豆。【原文：China is restarting soybean auctions — after a three-week pause — in an apparent attempt to clear storage space as it keeps buying from the US following the trade truce between the two countries.】

item.title: 新西兰银行表示，2026年新西兰房价将小幅上涨
item.description: 新西兰银行表示，尽管经济正在复苏，但该国住房市场缺乏动力，今年房价涨幅仅为2.1%。【原文：New Zealand’s housing market lacks momentum and prices will rise just 2.1% this year despite an economic recovery, according to Bank of New Zealand.】

item.title: B.Grimm以2.3亿美元收购美国水电运营商25%股权
item.description: B.Grimm Power Pcl以2.3亿美元收购了New England Reliable Hydropower Holdings LLC的25%股权，标志着这家泰国电力生产商在拓展海外市场可再生能源业务版图方面又迈出重要一步。【原文：B.Grimm Power Pcl has acquired a 25% stake in New England Reliable Hydropower Holdings LLC for $230 million, marking another step in the Thai power producer’s push to expand its renewable energy footprint in overseas markets.】

item.title: 印度股市抛售加剧，股票交易员寻求盈利契机
item.description: 共同基金投资者变得挑剔，分散投资。【原文：Mutual fund investors turn selective, spread bets.】

item.title: 中国太阳能股因取消出口退税计划而上涨
item.description: 中国主要太阳能企业股价大涨，此前政府宣布将取消部分产品的出口退税，此举可能加速该行业的整合进程——该行业正面临严重的产能过剩问题。【原文：Shares of major Chinese solar companies jumped after the government said it will cancel export tax rebates on some products, potentially accelerating consolidation in a sector that has been grappling with severe overcapacity.】

item.title: 万科面临新考验，债务违约压力加剧
item.description: 万科正面临新一轮重大考验。这家已成为中国房地产危机象征的开发商，正着手推迟债券偿付，并制定更广泛的重组计划。【原文：China Vanke Co. is bracing for its next major test as the developer that’s become a symbol of the nation’s broader property crisis navigates a proposal to delay bond payments and drafts broader restructuring plans.】

item.title: 美元跌至近三周低点，美联储收到传票
item.description: 美元汇率创下近三周最大跌幅，因美联储面临司法部大陪审团传票，引发市场对货币政策可能受到政治干预的担忧。【原文：The dollar declined the most in almost three weeks as the Federal Reserve faced grand jury subpoenas from the Justice Department, reviving concerns over political interference in monetary policy.】

item.title: 印度股市复苏前景因盈利增长放缓蒙上阴影
item.description: 印度股市短期前景黯淡，市场预期又一个平淡无奇的财报季将令反弹希望进一步减弱。【原文：Indian stocks face a subdued near-term outlook, with expectations of another lackluster earnings season dimming hopes for a rebound.】

item.title: 据称保诚金融考虑出售印度资产管理公司
item.description: 知情人士透露，保诚金融集团旗下投资管理业务部门正考虑出售其在印度的亏损资产管理业务，该业务十年前从德意志银行收购而来。【原文：Prudential Financial Inc.’s investment management arm is considering selling its loss-making asset management unit in India a decade after acquiring the business from Deutsche Bank AG, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阅读杰罗姆·鲍威尔关于司法部大陪审团传票的声明
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔就司法部向美联储发出大陪审团传票的完整声明，于1月11日晚间发布：【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s full statement on the Justice Department serving the Fed with grand jury subpoenas, issued the evening of Jan. 11:】

item.title: 澳大利亚宣布战略储备关键矿产清单
item.description: 澳大利亚计划从国内矿业公司采购并储备对国防和尖端技术至关重要的矿产资源，以助力强化全球供应链体系。【原文：Australia plans to buy and stockpile minerals essential for defense and advanced technologies from domestic mining companies to help strengthen global supply chains.】

item.title: 欧盟与南方共同市场达成贸易协定，挑战特朗普的保护主义
item.description: 欧盟与南方共同市场终于达成了他们长期寻求的贸易协定，并发表了一份政治声明——在25年前谈判开始时，几乎无人能预见这一幕。【原文：The European Union and Mercosur have delivered their long-sought trade pact, along with a political statement few could have imagined when talks began 25 years ago.】

item.title: 澳大利亚11月家庭支出超预期
item.description: 澳大利亚11月家庭支出增速超出预期，表明即便通胀和借贷成本居高不下，消费者对其财务状况仍充满信心。【原文：Australia’s household spending rose at a faster-than-expected pace in November, indicating consumers are feeling confident about their finances even as inflation and borrowing costs remain elevated.】

item.title: 《纽约时报》称检方对美联储主席鲍威尔启动刑事调查
item.description: 据《纽约时报》援引知情官员的消息报道，联邦检察官已就美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔展开刑事调查，调查内容涉及该央行对其华盛顿特区总部的翻修工程。【原文：Federal prosecutors have opened a criminal investigation into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell over the central bank’s renovation of its Washington, DC, headquarters, the New York Times reported, citing officials briefed on the situation.】

item.title: 英国90年代住房热潮让富家子弟获得最佳工作机会，英国财政研究所称
item.description: 平等运动人士长期以来一直强调，在1990年代末和2000年代初的房地产繁荣时期，英国家庭通过暴富获得了意外之财，并利用这笔财富帮助子女登上房产阶梯。鲜为人知的是，同样的房产财富也帮助这些孩子获得了最佳工作机会。【原文：Equality campaigners have long highlighted how British families who made a fortune during the housing boom of the late 1990s and 2000s used the windfall to give their children a leg up on the property ladder. Less well known is that the same property wealth helped those kids bag the best jobs.】

item.title: 英国预算案公布后，招聘人数以四个月来最快速度下滑
item.description: 英国雇主在12月再次缩减招聘规模，一项备受关注的调查显示，这可能加剧英国央行对就业市场疲软的担忧。【原文：UK employers cut back their hiring again in December, according to a closely watched survey that is likely to add to the Bank of England’s concerns about a weakening jobs market.】

item.title: 文博本季度有望跃升4%，得益于政策支持与资金流入
item.description: 据当地分析师称，在政府抑制汇率波动的措施以及外国资本大量涌入本土股市的支撑下，韩元本季度有望实现4%的升值。【原文：The South Korean won is on track for a 4% gain this quarter, supported by government measures to curb volatility and a flood of foreign capital into local stocks, according to local analysts.】

item.title: 特朗普推动美联储变革，全球利率路径分化
item.description: 随着各国央行在特朗普执政第二年引发的经济迷雾中摸索前行，全球利率分化趋势即将显现。【原文：A spell of global interest-rate divergence is in store as central banks feel their way through the economic fog stoked by Donald Trump’s second year at the White House.】

item.title: 高盛预测美国经济强劲增长，通胀温和，美联储将降息两次
item.description: 高盛集团经济学家表示，今年美国经济将受益于减税、实际工资增长和财富增加，同时通胀将趋于温和。【原文：The US economy this year will get a boost from tax cuts, real wage gains and rising wealth, while inflation will moderate, according to economists at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 人民币汇率看涨情绪升温，美元对冲成本触及三年低点
item.description: 对中国人民币的乐观情绪正蔓延至对冲活动领域，内地投资者为防范美元可能贬值而需支付的成本已降至三年低点。【原文：Growing optimism toward the Chinese yuan is spreading into hedging activities, with the cost that mainland investors have to pay to guard against possible dollar losses falling to a three-year low.】

item.title: 金价因美国就业数据疲软及伊朗局势紧张创历史新高
item.description: 美国就业数据公布后，市场对美国进一步降息的预期保持不变，金价因此攀升至历史新高；与此同时，伊朗抗议活动持续升级，使地缘政治紧张局势居高不下。【原文：Gold rose to a record high after US jobs data left expectations for additional US interest-rate cuts intact, while intensifying protests in Iran kept geopolitical tensions elevated.】

item.title: Netflix开启其宏大的播客实验
item.description: 奈飞进军播客领域是该平台发展历程中的重要时刻——对播客行业而言更是具有深远意义的重大事件。【原文：Netflix’s embrace of podcasting is a major moment for the service -- and a bigger one for the podcast industry】

item.title: Meta因澳大利亚儿童社交媒体禁令关闭55万账户
item.description: Meta Platforms公司表示，为遵守澳大利亚针对儿童实施的具有里程碑意义的社交媒体禁令，该公司已在该国关闭近55万个账户。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. said it has shut down almost 550,000 accounts in Australia to comply with the country’s landmark social media ban for children.】
